UniqueMagicItems.Name: Draakhorn
UniqueMagicItems.Description: This horn is associated with the Cult of the Dragon and can summon dragons.

UniqueMagicItems.Name: Gnomengarde Grenade
UniqueMagicItems.Description: This magical grenade is connected to the gnome city of Gnomengarde.

UniqueMagicItems.Name: Mask of the Dragon Queen
UniqueMagicItems.Description: This mask is a powerful artifact related to the Dragon Queen Tiamat.
